survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Peer-to-Peer Car Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in peer-to-peer car sharing services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use peer-to-peer car sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for better mobile compatibility.

script.question_text: How often do you use peer-to-peer car sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a peer-to-peer car sharing service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection and limit to 3 choices.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a peer-to-peer car sharing service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the vehicles you've rented?
